name: Our house in the woods
description:
Description

A bite sized 5 minute game made for "16th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam".

Take control of Roger, a simple man with a simple life going about his day. Once work is over take a peek into his not-so-simple hidden past.


Controls

MovementArrow keys or D-PadInteractZ or Joypad button


Credits

>>> Art assets by:

LimeZu

>>> Plugins used:

Galv's Cam Control MZ

Gabe MZ - Message Plus

QJ-Lighting

VisuMZ

DK Big Events

Hope you've enjoyed it.

Leave a comment if you would like to see more,

this will help me on my game dev journey.

Peace!
